title: 地图问题
author: 爱刷JJ怪
txt_content:
为什么有时候看地图会结束游戏？出现一堆文字？
就这个
 Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.


--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7cf3a456 --------
Generated 12-12-15 下午12:39
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.2.5
OS: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
Java: 1.6.0_37, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: GeForce G 103M/PCIe/SSE2 version 3.3.0, NVIDIA Corporation
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
 at ack.a(SourceFile:332)

 at vq.e(SourceFile:213)

 at yw.J_(SourceFile:196)

replies.author: Sky、果冻
replies.txt_content: 发错板块不予回答，有问题请到你问我答区
